verses.text: \w When|strong="H0559"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Are|strong="H0859"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w then|strong="H0859"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* alone, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w shall|strong="H4191"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*?

\w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H3644"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*: \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* ignorant \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*, \w which|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H0854"\w*?

\w He|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* \w is|strong="H6662"\w* mocked \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w friends|strong="H7453"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H1961"\w*, shall \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* \w and|strong="H7453"\w* \w he|strong="H7121"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* hear \w him|strong="H7121"\w*: \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* simplicity \w of|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w man|strong="H6662"\w* \w is|strong="H6662"\w* laughed \w to|strong="H1961"\w* scorn.

\w The|strong="H3559"\w* lamp \w despised|strong="H0937"\w* \w in|strong="H7272"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* thoughts \w of|strong="H7272"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* rich, is \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* time \w appointed|strong="H3559"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* tabernacles \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w robbers|strong="H7703"\w* abound, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w provoke|strong="H7264"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* boldly; whereas \w it|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w given|strong="H3027"\w* all \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*:

\w But|strong="H0199"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* they \w shall|strong="H0929"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w birds|strong="H5775"\w* \w of|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* air, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* they \w shall|strong="H0929"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* thee.

\w Speak|strong="H7878"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0176"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w it|strong="H0176"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* answer thee: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0176"\w* fishes \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0176"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w tell|strong="H5608"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* ignorant \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*?

\w In|strong="H0376"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w thing|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.

Doth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* discern \w words|strong="H4405"\w*, \w and|strong="H0241"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w palate|strong="H2441"\w* \w of|strong="H0241"\w* him \w that|strong="H3808"\w* eateth, \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w taste|strong="H2938"\w*?

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* ancient \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w length|strong="H0753"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* prudence.

\w With|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w is|strong="H2451"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w strength|strong="H1369"\w*, \w he|strong="H8394"\w* hath \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*.

\w If|strong="H2005"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w pull|strong="H2040"\w* \w down|strong="H2040"\w*, there \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w*: \w if|strong="H2005"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w*. \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, there \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w*.

\w If|strong="H2005"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* withhold \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, all things \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w dried|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w if|strong="H2005"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w*, \w they|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* overturn \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w With|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w is|strong="H7683"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w and|strong="H5797"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H8454"\w*: \w he|strong="H7683"\w* knoweth both \w the|strong="H5973"\w* deceiver, \w and|strong="H5797"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* that \w is|strong="H7683"\w* deceived.
\w He|strong="H8199"\w* bringeth counsellors \w to|strong="H3289"\w* \w a|strong="H3289"\w* foolish end, \w and|strong="H8199"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w to|strong="H3289"\w* insensibility.

\w He|strong="H4428"\w* looseth \w the|strong="H0631"\w* \w belt|strong="H0232"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* girdeth \w their|strong="H0631"\w* \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H4428"\w* cord.
He leadeth away \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* without glory, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* overthroweth nobles.

\w He|strong="H2205"\w* changeth \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w speech|strong="H8193"\w* \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* true speakers, \w and|strong="H2205"\w* taketh \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* doctrine \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w aged|strong="H2205"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* poureth \w contempt|strong="H0937"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w princes|strong="H5081"\w*, \w and|strong="H0650"\w* relieveth \w them|strong="H5921"\w* that \w were|strong="H5921"\w* oppressed.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* discovereth \w deep|strong="H6757"\w* \w things|strong="H1540"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* bringeth \w up|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H1540"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6757"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w death|strong="H6757"\w*.

He multiplieth \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* destroyeth \w them|strong="H5148"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* restoreth \w them|strong="H5148"\w* again after \w they|strong="H1471"\w* \w were|strong="H1471"\w* overthrown.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* changeth \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* princes \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* deceiveth \w them|strong="H8582"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w walk|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* vain \w where|strong="H3808"\w* there \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w grope|strong="H4959"\w* as \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w dark|strong="H2822"\w*, \w and|strong="H2822"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, \w and|strong="H2822"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* make \w them|strong="H8582"\w* \w stagger|strong="H8582"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* men \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3808"\w* \w drunk|strong="H7910"\w*.
